title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-2.1 - Expanded Polystyrene Foam Container Ban
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-2.1 - Expanded Polystyrene Foam Container Ban

State Regulations

Beginning January 1, 2022, no covered food service
provider or store shall sell, offer for sale, or distribute disposable food
service containers that contain expanded polystyrene foam in New York

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
353-2.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 4/14/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
